/usr/bin/c++   -I /home/barracuda/a/lrajendr/SchlierenRayVis/SchlierenRay/cuda-samples/NVIDIA_CUDA-7.0_Samples/common/inc -L /usr/include -lbz2 -lpng -L/usr/lib64 -lbz2 -lpng -L /home/barracuda/a/lrajendr/usr/include -ltiff -I /home/barracuda/a/lrajendr/SchlierenRayVis/StereoBOS_pinhole/schlieren-0.2.0-src -g    CMakeFiles/schlieren.dir/main.cpp.o CMakeFiles/schlieren.dir/schlierenfilter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/schlieren.dir/schlierenimagefilter.cpp.o CMakeFiles/schlieren.dir/schlierenrenderer.cpp.o ./schlieren_generated_host_render.cu.o  -o schlieren -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libteem.a -lglut -lGL /home/barracuda/a/lrajendr/SchlierenRayVis/SchlierenRay/cuda-samples/cuda/lib64/libcudart.so -lcuda -Wl,-rpath,/home/barracuda/a/lrajendr/SchlierenRayVis/SchlierenRay/cuda-samples/cuda/lib64
